code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useContext}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{AuthContext}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardAdmin=()=>{const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);const[stats,setStats]=useState({users:0,stores:0,ratings:0});useEffect(()=>{const fetchStats=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/admin/stats',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.token}`}});setStats(res.data);}catch(err){console.error('Failed to fetch admin stats:',err);}};fetchStats();},[user]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-4xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6",children:"\uD83D\uDCCA Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md p-6 rounded text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-people-fill text-blue-600 text-3xl mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:"Total Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl",children:stats.users})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md p-6 rounded text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-shop-window text-green-600 text-3xl mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:"Total Stores"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl",children:stats.stores})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md p-6 rounded text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-star-fill text-yellow-500 text-3xl mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:"Total Ratings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl",children:stats.ratings})]})]})]});};export default DashboardAdmin;
